text: The Book of Pooh is an American children's television series. It aired on Playhouse Disney on Disney Channel, It is the third series to have the characters from the Disney franchise based on A. A. Milne's works. It was broadcast from 2001 to 2003. It was produced by Shadow Projects. A direct-to- video spin-off based on the puppetry television series called The Book of Pooh: Stories of Heart, the series is created by Mitchell Kriegman. The series earned three Emmy Awards. It won the "Outstanding Directing in a Children's Series" at the 29th Daytime Emmy Awards in 2002. title: The Book of Pooh
